processPoint.description: The location where the information was generated. (Siehe Anlagen Bezeichnungskonzept)

total.description: Total number of parcel passed the reading device.

read.description: Number of parcel successfully read at processpoint and the cen-mc-rc.submit-mailpiece event has been sent to the coding system.

description: The read rate event of an element. The counter will be used for visualization and statistic purposes.
